snippet: Students who attended a class in Brooklyn meant to educate bicyclists on the best ways to safely navigate New York streets ranged from experienced to semi-mortified riders.
abstract: Bike New York is a nonprofit group providing free cycling classes tailored specifically to the hazards of biking in New York City; group hopes to promote safe cycling as Citi Bike, bike share program, prepares to introduce thousands of new bicycles to the city's streets.
lead_paragraph: Students who attended a class in Brooklyn meant to educate bicyclists on the best ways to safely navigate New York streets ranged from experienced to semi-mortified riders.

headline.seo: Bike-Riding in City Traffic? Take Notes, Please
headline.main: Bicycling in the City and Living to Tell a Skittish Class
headline.print_headline: Bicycling in the City and Living to Tell a Skittish Class
